data.description:
The ultimate VR Golf experience and the official VR Golf game of the PGA TOUR!

**Available on QUEST 2, 3, and Pro**

‚ÄúThe GOLF+ VR platform is a forward-thinking way to enjoy the sport that is appealing to gamers and golfers of all levels.‚Äù - PGA TOUR

‚ÄúThe visuals are fantastic. It‚Äôs like morphing into another universe filled with vibrancy, dynamism and, most important, realism.‚Äù - Sports Illustrated

‚ÄúThe putting function ‚Äî which simulator golf has never quite cracked ‚Äî is particularly eye-opening.‚Äù - GOLF Magazine


Includes:

‚õ≥Ô∏è Iconic Courses: 3 Free Courses (Cliffs, Alpine, Castle Links) and 15+ real-world destinations available for purchase including Pebble Beach, The Old Course at St Andrews, TPC Sawgrass and more.

üèåÔ∏èMultiplayer: Play with your circle of friends, or join public rounds and connect with golf enthusiasts worldwide.

üìà Performance Feedback: Advanced shot stats, strokes gained data, handicap system, and swing analyzer to help you understand and improve your game.

üèÜ Competitive Play: Climb the ranks and compete globally on the GOLF+ TOUR, or go head to head in Battle mode.

‚úÖ Real Golf Brands: Experience golf equipment from leading brands like Callaway, TaylorMade, and PXG.

üéØ Diverse Modes: From Match Play to Skins, Weekly Challenges and Topgolf, we have an experience for every player.

üèû GOLF+ Clubhouse: A place to practice, fine tune your clubs, and play fun mini-games.

üñ• Media Player: Seamlessly enjoy YouTube and other web media right on the course.

changelog.change_log:
New Update v766.91

New Course: East Lake Golf Club - Renovated Version

Receive both the pre and post-renovated East Lake Golf Club for the price of one!

The new-look East Lake Golf Club will make its first public appearance at the 2024 TOUR Championship. Led by Andrew Green - coined as ‚Äúgolf‚Äôs new hottest architect‚Äù by Golf Digest - the project began immediately following the 2023 TOUR Championship with the goal of restoring the iconic property to its early 20th century roots. The most notable changes to the course are reflected in the topography, greens and bunkers to allow the course to play both firmer and faster. Streams and ponds were also a primary focus to bring back the native habitat and have water play as a more punishing hazard.

**PLEASE NOTE**: Purchasing the post renovation East Lake Golf Club will also grant the pre-renovated East Lake for free. If you already own the original East Lake, you will automatically receive the post renovated East Lake for free. In game, the new version will be 'East Lake Golf Club' and the pre-renovated version will be 'East Lake 2023'.

Course Updates:
Cliffs - Cleaned up some 'triangles' on the course that would show on the Map interface
Castle Pines - Cleaned up some lines within the skybox and fixed a seam between fairway and rough on Hole 13

New Update v765.16

New Course: Castle Pines

Colorado's stunning Castle Pines Golf Club is set to host the top 50 players at the 2024 BMW Championship, the penultimate event of PGA TOUR's FedExCup Playoffs. 
Designed by Jack Nicklaus, this private club set against the backdrop of the majestic Rocky Mountains features drastic elevation changes, towering pine trees and native wildlife. 
Castle Pines is a mainstay in Golf Digest's Top 50 Greatest Courses in America list and is proudly home of "The Best Day of Golf in America."

Elevation Update:
Ball flight physics have been updated for all courses in-game to take course elevation into account. 
In higher elevation courses the ball flies further. This change only applies to Physics V2.

Bug Fixes:
- Media Player keyboard not working in text fields of websites.
- A crash could occur when accepting a Topgolf invite while on the Quickplay start UI.

New Update v764.0

VR FedExCup Playoff Branding:
- Updated all tee markers, flags and hospitality tents with new branding.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where players would see another player's dust effect on their ball in MP.
- Addressed web crashes that could occur when changing scenes.
- Addressed web crashes that could occur when filtering thru leaderboards.

New Update v763.05

**New Game Mode: Scramble**
Experience team golf like never before with Scramble. In Scramble, players can play together in teams of 2, 3 or 4 golfers with each player hitting their tee shot, and then the team deciding what shot to play from next. Continue this process until someone on the team holes a putt. Scramble teams can also compete against each other in 2v1, 3v1 or 2v2 formats.

Other Updates:
- Multiplayer - Updated player head and ball tips.
- Multiplayer - you can now see other players shots on the main course UI.

Quality and Bug Fixes:
- Ability to accept an MP game invite while in the 'game mode' select screen.
- Match Play and Skins had no concede sound playing before scorecard appeared.

Course fixes:
- Lighting on Wolf Creek clubhouse
- Lighting on Houses off Sawgrass Hole 10
- Out of bounds update on Bay Hill

New Update v762.40

New Course: Sweetens Cove Golf Club

Beautiful. Strategic. Fun. Sweetens Cove, a masterpiece crafted by visionary designers Rob Collins and Tad King, epitomizes the essence of modern golf. Nestled in the foothills of Appalachia, just 30 minutes from Chattanooga, Tennessee, its unique nine-hole, 18-pin routing ensures endless variety and challenge for each hole. There‚Äôs no lavish clubhouse or driving range‚Äîjust a trailer, a few carts, and a playground for golfers to unleash their imagination and creativity.

Quality Updates and Bug Fixes:
- Closest To The Pin - Entering this mode from another mode would show your previous lie in the course screen.
- Tournaments - Leaving a tournament round on Hole 1 would not offer you a resume tournament and result in a DNF.
- If you did not update the app to the latest version, trying to start a Tournament Round or Challenge on a newly released course would cause a soft crash. Now you will not be allowed to start and will be prompted to update the app. 
- Fixed the G+ Credit balance from showing too many decimal places in your Profile.
- Updated Quickplay to remember the Green Speed from your last played session.
- Holding side trigger or raising the club to see the UI above the hole, will now show 'Wrong Pin' on courses with greens that have 2 holes.
- Giant Mode positioning updates.

Course Updates: Spyglass
- Tee Markers now have collision.
- Hole 9: Aligned a tree model to not interfere with tee shots.
- Hole 14: Adjusted the OB on the left side of the fairway.
- Hole 16: Fixed a stake that was floating on the left side of green.

New Update v761.2

New Course: Spyglass Hill

Just a few miles north of the iconic Pebble Beach Golf Links, Spyglass Hill is celebrated as the toughest test on the Monterey Peninsula. Crafted by renowned designer Robert Trent Jones Sr., this course boasts a unique dual personality. The first five holes play along the coastal dunes, offering breathtaking Pacific Ocean views, before transitioning into the serene and challenging Del Monte Forest. Known affectionately as "Spy," this course co-hosts the prestigious AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am on the PGA TOUR.

Bug Fixes & Quality Updates:

- The course settings 'holes selection' would not reset to 'Full 18' after playing Butler Pitch and Putt.
- A specific UX flow would prevent players from entering Butler Pitch and Putt in Quick Play mode.
- A navigation issue in Challenges where the top menu bar back arrow wouldn't appear after going to another mode.
- In Clubhouse practice mode, when tapping 'new ball', the new ball was not lined up towards the hole.
- Updated green fringe physics.

**New Update v760.17**

**‚õ≥ New Course: Butler Pitch and Putt ‚õ≥**

Butler Pitch and Putt is a historic 9-hole, par-3 golf course which has been a cultural staple in downtown Austin, Texas since 1949. Just a quick 10 minute drive from our headquarters, with holes ranging from 60 to 105 yards, Butler operates on a first-come, first-play basis‚Äîno tee times, just drop a ball into the chute to claim your spot. Home of the Tito's Shorties Classic and supporting partner of Save Muny and Youth On Course, Butler Pitch and Putt truly embodies the spirit of making golf accessible and enjoyable for all.

Butler is an example of golf at its best: it's fun, it doesn't take itself too seriously, and it is welcoming to everyone. We've enjoyed rounds at Butler with first time golfers & seasoned vets, humans & dogs, and people wearing golf shoes, flip-flops & cowboy boots. We‚Äôre excited that Butler stands shoulder-to-shoulder with many of the world‚Äôs best courses in GOLF+.

Please explore this playground of a course, and keep an eye out for all the small details scattered about. The scoreboard behind the putting green for Aces and Low Round is always live, so be sure to dial in your pitch game!

Patch v759.04

Bug Fixes & Quality Updates:
- Fixed an issue starting a Tournament or Practice Round causing an infinite loading screen.
- Another fix for audio loss.

Patch Fix Update v758.03

- Fixed an issue causing the Shot Shaper option to become unchecked every time you quit the app.

New Update v758.02

‚õ≥Ô∏è New Course: Muirfield Village Golf Club ‚õ≥Ô∏è

Forged from the mind of a legend, Muirfield Village's championship pedigree speaks for itself. Designed by the esteemed Jack Nicklaus and continually refined over the years, the challenging course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs prestigious Memorial Tournament. Demanding yet fair, the layout rewards precise shot-making and strategic thinking, inviting players to navigate complex greens, heavy rough, strategic bunkering, and water hazards lurking on 11 of its holes. Playing at Muirfield Village is more than just golf; it's an opportunity to engage with a course that embodies the spirit and history of the game.

**Bug Fixes & Quality:**
- Players could lose all audio sounds during a round. 
- Performance improvements on Yale Golf Course.
- Tournament tier badges would not show on Daily & Weekly Leaderboards.
- Text updates to Daily & Weekly Tournament Leaderboards.

New Update v758.01

‚õ≥Ô∏è New Course: Muirfield Village Golf Club ‚õ≥Ô∏è

Forged from the mind of a legend, Muirfield Village's championship pedigree speaks for itself. Designed by the esteemed Jack Nicklaus and continually refined over the years, the challenging course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs prestigious Memorial Tournament. Demanding yet fair, the layout rewards precise shot-making and strategic thinking, inviting players to navigate complex greens, heavy rough, strategic bunkering, and water hazards lurking on 11 of its holes. Playing at Muirfield Village is more than just golf; it's an opportunity to engage with a course that embodies the spirit and history of the game.

**Bug Fixes & Quality:**
- Players could lose all audio sounds during a round. 
- Performance improvements on Yale Golf Course.
- Tournament tier badges would not show on Daily & Weekly Leaderboards.
- Text updates to Daily & Weekly Tournament Leaderboards.

Patch v755.04

Bug Fixes:

- Fixed Public Multiplayer Games not showing for players.
- Fixed a crash caused by receiving a Topgolf game invite.
- Fixed a crash that was caused by corrupted data in the Tournament Summary end screen.

New Update v755.01

**New Feature: GOLF+ TOUR Daily Tournaments**

Daily Tournaments are now part of the GOLF+ TOUR. Golfers can now add points to their GOLF+ TOUR Ranking with daily competitions at a rotating selection of golf courses.
Each Daily Tournament will pay out 5% of the points earned via the weekly tournaments. All tiers will compete on the same course conditions, with the only difference between tiers being green speed. GOLF+ TOUR Ranking points will be assigned at the end of each tournament week (Thursday-Wednesday) based on the total Daily + Weekly performance within that player‚Äôs tier.

**Bug Fixes & Quality Updates:**
- The UI is now HD when in Giant Mode.
- Fixed an issue with the Media Player turning on after changing scenes.

Patch 754.03
- Fix G+ TOUR tournament entry.

New Update v754.01

**Updated Course: Valhalla Golf Club**
- The PGA of America, along with The Nicklaus Design team, added additional championship tees in strategic areas throughout Valhalla. Along with updated tees, work has been done to bring out many of the natural features of the golf course.

**Bug Fixes & Quality Updates**
- Optimized overall performance on Quail Hollow.
- Menu button could become unresponsive after changing scenes, or entering/leaving Giant Mode.
- Advanced Shot Stats for club path and face angle were showing incorrect values for left handed players.

Patch Build v753.05

Bug Fix:
- Due to a timing issue, a player's putter could sometimes not make contact with the ball when putting on the green.

New Update v753.04

New Course: Quail Hollow Golf Club

Steeped in golf history, Quail Hollow Club plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs Wells Fargo Championship and soon, the 2025 PGA Championship.  
Quail Hollow Club also features ‚ÄúThe Green Mile‚Äù, the three-hole finishing stretch that has become known as one of the most challenging finishes on the PGA TOUR.

New Feature Update: Add A Friend
Improved our social feature for adding friends.  New main menu notifications for friends request and an updated post-round interface.

Bug Fixes & Quality:
- Fixed an issue where incorrect yardage distances could be shown in Practice mode
- Fixed an issue when subscribing to the G+ Pass via the footer would throw an 'offline' error
- Fixed an issue when adding friends post round that would cause an infinite loading screen
- Fixed an issue where game invites are sent again to the player/s when modifying a multiplayer game
- Fixed an issue in Battle where the UI would show incorrect club and yardage when changing courses
- Fixed an issue in Battle where your opponent could have a ball marker underneath their ball
- Fixed an issue where the leaderboard could go all white
- Fixed an issue with the Media Player will be in the way for Left Handed players when triggering to follow their ball
- Fixed an issue with accidental hits occurring when the controller becomes active after interacting with Meta overlays
- Wind direction now matches between Tournament Practice & Tournament Round
- Harbour Town: Updated the Lighthouse on Hole 18
- Harbour Town: Fixed a issue that was showing TPC Scottsdale on the leaderboard when playing Harbour Town
- Harbour Town: Fixed an issue with the flags not matching the wind direction
- East Lake: Fixed a floating tree left of the fairway on Hole 18
- Valhalla: Fixed areas of the Hole 13 green registering as OB
- Valhalla: Fixed cart paths registering as OB if ball came to rest there
- Yale: Turkeys are back!
